Next, a fabulous mix of favorites comes together in Caprese Avocado Toast, and standby meets speedy in Tex-Mex Pantry Gnocchi Soup. Stick with Ree for fast, easy eats that make life simpler.

videos.title: Lighter Classics
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen giving classic dishes a lighter spin. There are incredible spice-rubbed Grilled Cauliflower Steaks and fully loaded Lightened Up Nachos. She also makes a platter of Mushroom "Cheesesteak" Lettuce Wraps, and plain old mash gets a boost as Garlic Mashed Potatoes.

videos.title: Quick and Easy Weeknight Dinners
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is serving up four quick and easy weeknight dinners. First, there's Shrimp Sheet Pan Pita with delicious yogurt sauce and fixins. Then she assembles a taco bar for make-your-own Jalapeno Popper Tacos, and her Five-Spice Steak Bowls are fast, fabulous and filling. Finally, Eggplant Parm One Pot Pasta is a midweek winner, and Ree's got things covered for dinner in a dash.

videos.title: Never Enough Pasta
videos.overview: There's never enough pasta on the ranch, so Ree Drummond is playing around with pasta all ways. She puts a spin on an old favorite with Greek Spaghetti and Meatballs and goes veggie-forward with a baked Butternut Squash Pasta Casserole. She whips up hot and spicy Mean Green Fusilli, and there's even pasta for dessert -- Fried Ravioli with Chocolate.

videos.title: All in the Game
videos.overview: Ree Drummond and her crew are cooking up football tailgate eats, kicking off with Strawberry Cobbler Squares and scoring big with Spicy Mango BBQ Turkey Meatballs. There are winning Hoagies with Quick Pepper Relish, and Ree tastes victory with her Game Day Guacamole.

videos.title: Fall Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating autumn with seasonal favorites like a sensational Fall Salad with Spicy Brittle. She also makes Very Veggie Soup that tastes like a harvest in a bowl and her go-to dish for entertaining, Wine-Braised Chicken with Apricots. For a sweet finish, she makes Autumn Fruit Compote Sundaes.

videos.title: Quick and Easy Sweet Treats
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen making sweet treats. There's a picture-perfect Puff Pastry Braid filled with nuts and chocolate spread, and her 4-Berry Chimichangas are completely irresistible. She makes Cake Mix Bars packed with some of her favorite candies, and mint-flavored Icebox Sandwiches are refreshingly delightful.

videos.title: Let's Get Toasted
videos.overview: It's a feast for toast lovers in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen. First, she makes Chicken Pot Pie Toast, which has a comforting, creamy filling served on crispy brioche. Then, she makes an incredible French Onion Grilled Cheese followed by Mixed Mushroom Toast with Whipped Ricotta on rustic Italian bread. Finally, Ree's Cinnamon S'mores Toast is the perfect dessert for toast fans.

videos.title: Super Easy Italian
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen serving up simple dishes with an Italian spin. First up are Italian Beef Sandwiches with an incredible pepper salad. Then, she makes a delicious mashup with her make-ahead Spaghetti Pizza Pie followed by shortcut Garlic and Herb Mozzarella Sticks. Finally, Ree serves her take on a classic frozen dessert, No Churn Spumoni. Bellissima!

videos.title: Best of 16-Minute Meals: Italian Family Style
videos.overview: Ree Drummond serves up a collection of family style Italian 16-minute meals. There's Speedy Pork Scaloppini, a delicious Drummond fave, Pasta with Pesto and Peas that Paige adores, and Snappy Italian Sausage Pasta Skillet that's an unbeatable dinner made in moments. Plus, 16 Min-estrone Soup makes quick work of lunch. It's all Italian inspired and cooked against the clock.

videos.title: What to Bring
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen celebrating Thanksgiving with delicious dishes to take to holiday get-togethers. She starts with Caramelized Onion and White Cheddar Mac, an upscale twist on a classic, and follows that with a perfect host gift, Pumpkin Scones with Coffee Glaze for breakfast the morning after. Everyone loves a festive Gooey Brie Crescent Wreath as an appetizer, and Ree shares a fresh take on a favorite side with Spicy Parmesan Brussels Sprouts.

videos.title: One Potato, Two Potato
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen cooking delicious dishes with different kinds of potatoes. First up is an incredible Purple Sweet Potato Soup with a fantastic pistachio crumble. Then, roasted russets and sweet potatoes star in a super easy Corned Beef Hash, and adorable marble potatoes go into a Sausage, Pepper and Potato Skillet. Finally, humble leftover mashed potatoes are the secret ingredient in Ree's Potato Dumplings.

videos.title: Best of Ranch Christmas Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing a seasonal spread of her favorite Christmas dishes. She starts with Mexican Wedding Cookies and Holiday Bacon Appetizers, delicious vintage treats passed down by her family. Then, it's on to festive finger food with Grilled Chicken Skewers, fabulous Fig and Blue Cheese Bruschetta, and no-cook Cheesy Mini Peppers. For last-minute eats, there's a fun Christmas Tree Pizza and 10-minute Chicken Curry in a Hurry. She unwraps a stunning side with Yorkshire Pudding and tells the secret of her showstopper Prime Rib with Rosemary Salt Crust. Next, Ree beings her potluck A-game with Cheery Cheesecake Santa Hats, cute Holiday Haystacks, Shortcut Peppermint Bark and charming Christmas Tree Tarts. Plus, there's a sneak peak of Ree's holiday movie, Candy Coated Christmas.

videos.title: Small Bites, Big Day
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is full of the holiday spirit and preparing small bites for the big day. There are festive Mini Peppermint Rolls, perfect as a treat for Santa. Then, a trio of simple, seasonal savories: very Christmassy Crispy Cauliflower Cakes, cowboy favorite Steak Bites with Spicy Blue Cheese Cream and beautiful Charcuterie Board Bites. It's all about amazing, easy apps and fun finger food.

videos.title: Best of Pastry Perfection
videos.overview: It's all about pastry as Ree Drummond shares a collection of favorite bakes. There's Caramel Apple Pie with a spiced take on perfect pie crust, divine shortcut Puff Pastry Pizzas and portable Spinach Phyllo Hand Pies. Then, pie dough scraps get a new lease on life in a trio of treats, Cheese and Chipotle Scrap Crackers with an easy Leftover Cheese Dip, sweet Cinnamon Sugar Scrap Cookies and fantastic Fried Dough.

videos.title: One-Pan Crowd Pleasers
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking up her favorite one-pan crowd pleasers that friends and family will love. There's Easy Mexican Chicken and Rice that works for a party, plus a duo of perfect pastas: shortcut Sheet Pan Lasagna and a delicious mashup Sloppy Joe Mac and Cheese. Finally, Braised Short Ribs and Carrots are just the thing for a celebration. These ideas are great for the holidays -- or anytime!

videos.title: Best of Cowboy Breakfast
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is serving up stories of three cowboy breakfasts from over the years. There's incredible Breakfast Cookies for Bryce and a big batch of Breakfast Burritos, filled with an all-in-one spicy meat and egg scramble, for Ladd to take to a cattle working in Kansas. Plus, it's a special delivery of delicious Sweet Orange Rolls and Peppered Bacon. It's rise and shine with breakfast ranch style.

videos.title: 4 Ways to Start the Day
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen sharing four of her favorite ways to start the day. First, she's preparing marvelous make-ahead and portable Tex-Mex Egg Muffins and stunning Lemon Poppy Seed Pancakes that are perfect for a brunch party. Next, there's fabulous Breakfast Grits Bowls to ensure you rise and shine, and a quick Peach Breakfast Mug Cake is a delicious wake up call.

videos.title: Leading Vegetables
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch celebrating the leading lights of the vegetable world. Tomato Cobbler with a fabulous cheesy herb topping is first on the menu. An ensemble of vibrant greens star in Ree's Veggie-Packed Baked Pasta, which is followed by a warming Simple Curry Pumpkin Soup. Finally, Rich Cauliflower Mash takes the sensational side dish spotlight, wrapping up four fantastic veggie dishes guaranteed to get rave reviews.

videos.title: Pocketbook-Friendly
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is serving up four ranch-approved dishes that won't break the bank. She makes delicious Italian Chicken Meatballs over salad followed by speedy Chili Verde with all the fixins. Then, a fun Tortilla Breakfast Bake is a brilliant start to the day, and Ree makes Sweet and Salty Fudge for a totally irresistible treat.

videos.title: Ree-freshed
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen refreshing, or "Ree-freshing," some of her favorite eats. She makes delicious Skirt Steak and Sweet Potato Fries, rustles up a Tex-Mex Chicken Pot Pie, bakes a Boozy Berry Upside Down Cake and fries up Pesto Egg Toast.

videos.title: Easy and Elegant
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch cooking dishes that are both simple and refined. First up is an awesome appetizer of Crab Cakes and 5-Ingredient Remoulade. Then she doubles up on the main course with Peppercorn-Crusted Steak with Pimento Creamed Spinach in the style of a top-notch steakhouse and a one-pan wonder, Lemon-Thyme Sheet Pan Chicken and Potatoes. Ree's final course is a simply stunning No-Bake Spiced Cheesecake.

videos.title: Game Day Eats
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is scoring big with easy game day eats, kicking off with a dream team mashup of Pizza Dip with Garlic Toast and combining two star players in Hamburger Potato Skins, taking snacks to a different league. Then she ups her on-the-go game with BBQ Pork Walking Tacos and super easy shortcut Portable Cookie Sundaes.

videos.title: Dinner for Your Sweetie
videos.overview: Love is in the air on the ranch, and Ree Drummond is sharing her ideas for a romantic meal for that special someone. She teams Crispy Herb-Crusted Chicken Cutlets with cheesy Mushroom and Black Pepper Pasta, and there's a beautiful Grilled Tomato and Caesar Salad that's perfect for sharing. Finally, Ree makes a super easy yet luxurious Dark Chocolate Cherry Loaf Cake for dessert.

videos.title: New Weeknight Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch dishing up some new favorites that add "wow" to weeknights. There's a whole new take on Cheeseburger Sliders and a super quick skillet full of Rigatoni with Broccolini and Sausage. Next up is an impressive Easy Tomato Pie followed by an irresistible meal of Pretzel-Crusted Chicken Strips.

videos.title: Grandma Knows Best
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is paying tribute to the fabulous food she remembers from her grandma's house. First, she makes Retro Salisbury Steak in delicious gravy. On the side, there are Skillet Scalloped Potatoes, a childhood favorite, and Grandma's irresistible Green Beans. For dessert, Ree makes a Go-To Apple Crisp that was delicious back then and is truly divine now. When it comes to good food, there's no doubt about it, Grandma knows best.

videos.title: Foolproof Fallbacks
videos.overview: Ree Drummond whips up four dishes that can't go wrong. First up is an easy Chocolate Sheet Cake with Vanilla Bean Frosting that the Drummond family loves. Then she makes a pasta double with delicious Stuffed Peppers and simple Tex-Mex Chicken Spaghetti. Finally, Ree puts a spin on a classic with Whiskey Pot Roast.

videos.title: 4 Ways With Cheese
videos.overview: Things are getting very cheesy in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen, with four recipes and eight different cheeses! She takes Italian food to the next level with 5-Cheese Pasta, and fresh mozzarella stars in her Fried Green Tomato Caprese Salad mashup. Her goat cheese-topped Fiery Goat Dip is beyond delicious, and for dessert, there's a marvelous Mascarpone Berry Bowl.

videos.title: Citrus Twist
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is giving everything a citrus twist! She makes simple and stunning Sticky Crispy Orange Shrimp and fresh, zesty Lemon Pepper Tenderloin Pasta. Then, she adds a sweet touch with a glorious Grapefruit Tart and mixes up a pair of drinks -- a Ranch Water Cocktail and Blood Orange Ranch Water.

videos.title: Quick and Easy Breakfasts
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is starting her day on the ranch with a fabulous foursome of quick and easy breakfasts. There are perfect, all-in-one Mini Bagel Breakfast Sandwiches and stacks of stunning, shortcut Double Chocolate Chip Pancakes. Then she makes a marvelous Mean Green Scramble in minutes, followed by irresistible Cinnamon Sugar English Muffins for something sweet.

videos.title: Spring Dinner
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating the new season on the ranch with a simply delicious spring dinner. For starters, there's an easy Burrata and Spring Vegetable Toast, and for the main course, she makes Roasted Pork Tenderloin with bacon jam and a Cheesy Crispy Noodle Casserole on the side. To wrap things up, individual Lemon Raspberry Cakes make use of a handy shortcut. Spring is in the air, and dinner is served.

videos.title: First Anniversary
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating her daughter Alex and son-in-law Mauricio's first wedding anniversary by cooking recipes inspired by their honeymoon in the Maldives. First, she makes delicious Grilled Vegetable Hand Rolls, followed by Herbed Lemon Pasta with Lobster and Steak Bites. There are luxurious sweet treats, too, like White Chocolate Pistachio Truffles, and to toast the happy couple, Ree's Tropical Tequila Cocktails are a taste of the Indian Ocean, ranch-style.

videos.title: Spice It Up
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen adding variety and spice to some Drummond favorites. She turns out Spicy Garlic Bread Sloppy Joes that pair perfectly with a Pub Salad Board with Creamy Caper Tarragon Dressing, and for dessert, she makes Spicy Ginger Sundaes with 5 Spice Crisps and Spicy Ginger Caramel.

videos.title: Lovely Lunch for Mom
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing ideas for a special lunch just for Mom. She starts with Grilled Chicken Lettuce Wraps with Italian-style filling, accompanied by an incredible, colorful Grain Salad. For dessert, she makes super quick Dark Chocolate Espresso Sundaes, and fabulous Blood Orange and Basil Wine Spritzers are a tasty way to toast moms everywhere. Cheers!

videos.title: Super Slider Supper
videos.overview: A super slider supper is in the spotlight in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen. Taking center stage are Ladd's Chicken Bacon Sliders with the best supporting side, an Ultimate Grilled and Chopped Salad. There's a showstopping Brown Sugar Peach Ice Box Cake, and for the grand finale, Grilled Pineapple Cocktails.

videos.title: Post-Grad Eats
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking dishes inspired by her daughter Paige, who's graduating college soon and out working calves with Ladd. There's a fabulous Street Corn Skillet that's extra delicious with Tomato Avocado Salad. Then, Ree takes shortcuts with one-pan Ravioli and Meatball Soup and whips up trendy Spicy Ginger Chili Noodles. Finally, to hit the sweet spot, there's a No-Bake Raspberry Cheesecake. It's dad-and-daughter time outdoors and perfect post-grad eats in the kitchen.

videos.title: Noodle On It
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen noodling on one of her favorite foods -- pasta! She uses gemelli in deliciously luxurious Truffle Mac and Cheese and takes lasagna to the next level with incredible Pasta Rosettes. She tops linguine with Cauliflower Bolognese and even turns wonton wrappers into Shortcut Cheese Ravioli. That's four fresh ideas for putting a super easy spin on pasta classics.

videos.title: Dad-Friendly Dining
videos.overview: While husband Ladd is out feeding cattle, Ree Drummond is in her kitchen sharing a menu that every dad will love. She's kicking off with easy Cheesy Meatball Subs with Crispy Jalapeno and Onion Petals on the side. To hit the sweet spot, there's Dark Chocolate Puddings, all washed down with an Apple BBQ Tequila Cocktail. It's a great lineup for some very Dad-friendly dining.

videos.title: Mediterranean Summer Feast
videos.overview: Ree Drummond has summer entertaining covered with a Mediterranean feast of easy, party-worthy dishes. She's making delicious Marinated Citrus Salmon Skewers and Greek Yogurt Dip served with a one-pan Creamy Cheesy Orzotto and an irresistible vegetable platter with a hummus duo. Then, for dessert, there's simply divine Baklava-inspired Sundaes.

videos.title: Fridge Raid
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen raiding the fridge for some sensational eats while Ladd's out spring burning. First up, Fridge Raid Shakshuka is an incredible way to start the day, followed by easy and divine Produce Drawer Primavera. Then, Pancake Mix Dessert Crepes and Loaded Potato Pancakes round out the menu of four fabulous dishes, all thanks to Ree's fridge.

videos.title: Keeping It Saucy
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is keeping it saucy with five store-bought stars in four delicious dishes. First, pesto is in the spotlight in cute Pesto Egg Pockets, and chimichurri and aioli take center stage in Grilled Chimichurri Shrimp Wraps. Then, cheese sauce brings Cheesesteak Burgers to the next level, and enchilada sauce is a wonderful shortcut in a Tex-Mex Skillet.

videos.title: Book Faves
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen revisiting and refreshing some of her favorite recipes from her books. First up is Chicken Fried Steak Medallions, and Pantry Pasta 2.0 is a twist on an old classic. Chicken Summer Stir Fry is a new spin on a speedy standby, and then, she's showcasing Butter Pecan French Toast.

videos.title: Summer Sweets
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is creating incredible make-ahead summer sweets. There's a fabulous party-worthy Blackberry Crepe Cake and very glamorous Strawberry Prosecco Peach Jellies. Then, Ree stocks the freezer with shortcut Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches and fun standby Strawberry Avocado Pops. That's four delicious cool treats for hot weather, coming right up!

videos.title: Fair Food
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is putting fairground food to the test for fair-food lovers Alex and Mauricio. There are crazy Bacon Mac and Cheese Eggrolls, followed by Classic County Fair Turkey Legs served with a Sweet and Spicy BBQ Sauce. Next up, Ree makes Cheese on a Stick and, for something cool and refreshing, a Raspberry Orange Italian Ice.

videos.title: Summer Eats 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond lets the sunshine into her ranch kitchen with some easy summer eats. First, she makes a stunning Coconut Shrimp Salad, followed by very seasonal Summer Vegetable Enchiladas. Then, she crafts cute Corn Cakes with an incredible avocado salsa and finishes with cool Tropical Lime Parfaits.

videos.title: BBQ Feast
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up some delicious ideas for a barbecue feast using a Grilled Pineapple Pepper Relish to top both her Sticky BBQ Glazed Pork Tenderloin and Baked Cheese. Then, she prepares Ree's Eat Your Greens Salad on the side and a party-worthy Frozen Sangria for toasting.

videos.title: Quick and Easy Weeknight Dinners
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking up some quick and easy midweek dinners. First, she whips up delicious Grilled Steak Naan Tacos, followed by super fast Salmon Bites with Warm Brussels Sprout Slaw. Next up is Shortcut Cheesy Sausage One Pot Gnocchi and high-speed Crispy Everything Chicken Cutlets. That's four snappy and simple dinners, perfect for when time is tight.

videos.title: Sister Sister
videos.overview: Ree Drummond's sister Betsy is visiting, so the pair serve up Seattle-inspired recipes from Betsy's hometown. They whip up a Clam Dip that's perfect with Betsy's Potato Chips, some delicious Crispy Savory Pancakes and a Baked Fontina Cheese Board with Washington cheeses, all washed down with a refreshing and sparkling Strawberry Spritz. It's a Ree and Betsy sister act, bringing a taste of Seattle to the prairie.

videos.title: Game Day Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen winning big with a spread of great game day favorites. She kicks off with Bacon Cheeseburger Dip, followed by a Salsa Trio that's in a different league. Then, she tackles Popcorn Chicken with Maple Mustard Dip and a Bratwurst Bar, both guaranteed football crowd pleasers. So whether you are eating inside or out, Ree has your tailgate covered.

videos.title: No Fail Fall
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks some no-fail fall favorites, starting with an Autumn Steak Salad for a family-style feast and a one-pan Fall Chicken Skillet for the marvelous main course. Then, she preps Santa Fe Eggs in Purgatory for a perfect, all-day breakfast and her quick Mini Chocolate Tarts, the cutest treat she knows. They're all fool proof, delicious and seasonal fallbacks.

videos.title: Easy Chicken 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares a collection of her favorite easy chicken recipes from times gone by. First, there's Chicken Enchilasagna, a crazy Italian-Mexican mash-up, followed by Crispy Chicken Florentine Melts, a fridge-raid treasure. Then, she makes an incredibly comforting Braised Chicken with Apricots and serves up Crispy Chicken Skins to go with drinks.

videos.title: Housewarming Treats
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is preparing fall-inspired sweets to have on standby for visitors at her and her sister's remodeled house in town. She puts a spin on a campfire classic with her S'mores Cookies, makes delectable shortcut Cherry Cheesecake Brownie Cups, cooks easy Apple Fritters and blends together a divine Pumpkin Pie Snacking Granola. That's four fabulous housewarming treats for anyone that calls at the new abode!

videos.title: Fun Family Food
videos.overview: While Ladd and Todd are hauling hay out on the prairie, Ree Drummond makes family-friendly food with a fun spin. She kicks off with a totally over-the-top Bacon Cheeseburger Salad and celebrates her love of color with a Rainbow Pizza. Then, there's a total snack mash-up in perfect Potato Nachos and a store-bought spotlight in no-cook Cookie Dough Bars -- a perfect treat for the boys after an afternoon in the hay meadow.

videos.title: Easy Italian
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares easy Italian favorites from recent years. She starts with her make-ahead frozen Pizza Pockets -- one stuffed with meat and the other with mushrooms -- and prepares a fast and fabulous Lemon Pasta Pronto in minutes. Ree's all-in-one Sheet Pan Shrimp Puttanesca is the perfect snappy supper, while her Hot and Cheesy Baked Meatballs make an easy family meal. That's four delicious flavors of Italy, frontier style.

videos.title: Thinking Thrifty
videos.overview: Ree Drummond thinks thrifty with four fabulous meals that are easy on the pocketbook and big on flavor. First is a hearty Veggie Ragu with Cheesy Polenta followed by a luscious Creamy Pork Chop Pasta -- a 16-minute marvel. Then, she prepares stunning Slow Cooker Chicken Verde Burritos along with Cheeseburger Bowls that are a mash-up made in food heaven. That's four family favorite meals with a budget-cooking thumbs up.

videos.title: Fast Thanksgiving Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is shortcutting a selection of fast Thanksgiving favorites for the big day feast. The star of the show is a Spatchcock Turkey that shaves hours off the cooking time. On the sides, she's shaking up tradition with Stuffing Muffins, and store-bought rolls star in incredible Brown Butter & Sage Pull Apart Bread. Finally for dessert, her cute shortcut Fruity Cream Cheese Puff Pastries really hit the sweet spot.

videos.title: Thanksgiving Leftovers
videos.overview: Ree Drummond gives Thanksgiving leftovers a luscious new lease of life. She makes the feast rise and shine in epic Day After Thanksgiving Breakfast Sandwiches before turning the big day bird into Turkey Spaghetti, a new holiday leftover staple. Then, her mash gets a sensational second chance in amazing Loaded Potato Croquettes, and dessert becomes an over-the-top Pecan Pie Milkshake.

videos.title: Home for the Holidays
videos.overview: Christmas is coming, and Ree Drummond is sharing make-ahead eats for when the kids get home for the holidays. First, she whips up a shortcut Tex-Mex Meatball Soup that's perfect to have on standby in the days ahead. Then, she preps DIY Holiday Brownie Kits to keep the kids busy and a beautiful Breakfast Burrito Casserole to start a stress-free day. Finally, she brings together an epic stash of Everything Snack Mix, an all-purpose nibble ready for the festive season. That's a time-saving holiday line up to keep the kids fed and entertained.

videos.title: Christmas Bites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond creates amazing shortcut appetizers that are just the thing for the party season. She does a spin on a classic with her Spicy Grape Jelly Meatballs before revealing the secret to Holiday Mystery Rolls and updating her mom's recipe. Then, Ree preps perky little Pigs in Blankets with Cranberry Mustard, a glorious Christmas Crudité Tree with Festive Ranch and the cutest Pistachio Pudding Shooters. All perfect for a fun, family holiday.

videos.title: Sweet Tooth
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating her sweet tooth with some fabulous desserts and snacks from times gone by. First, divine boozy Peach Shortcakes are followed by a fun Waffle Cone Ice Cream Pie. Then, Butterscotch Lava Cakes are a twist on a sweet comfort favorite, and Cinnamon Toast is pure delicious nostalgia. That's four fantastic dishes that really hit the sweet spot.

videos.title: For Company
videos.overview: Ree Drummond remembers her favorite dishes for company from recent years. First, Double Chocolate Pie is an incredible celebration dessert with a torched meringue topping. Then, Tater Tot Breakfast Casserole is a brunch party classic. Next, Salmon and Cucumber Bites make a simple and stunning canape, and finally, Marvellous Millefeuille is a shortcut sweet treat to wow guests. That's four sensational dishes guaranteed to make entertaining easy.

videos.title: Fresh and Fast
videos.overview: Ree Drummond puts a fresh spin on dinner with a one-pan Chicken Cauliflower Skillet topped with smoky yogurt and Rustic Turkey Meatball Pasta with a surprising spin on the sauce. Then, there's Orange Ginger Steak Stir-Fry that's fast and fabulous and Grilled Pita Pizzas piled high with vegetables for a solo supper. It's all about great eats and good choices.

videos.title: One Becomes Three
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares how one delicious Perfect Paprika Pork Shoulder becomes three amazing, budget-friendly meals. First she makes White Beans with Pork & Croutons for a simple lunch, followed by Sheet Pan Nachos, which everyone loves, and Pork Celebration Sandwiches for Ladd and the cowboys. It's a total stretch as one great thing leads to another three.

videos.title: Quick Dinner Fixes 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond serves up a series of dinners in record time. She starts off with a swanky Steak Frites Salad mash-up with a speedy hollandaise sauce before moving on to One Pot Cajun Alfredo for perfect pasta pronto. Then, she whips up sensational shortcut Egg Roll Bowls and a Jalapeno Pineapple Pizza that's fast and foolproof. Ree's got meals in minutes covered with quick dinner fixes four ways.

videos.title: Best One Pan Wonders
videos.overview: Ree Drummond revisits some of her one-pan favorites. She prepares an incredibly easy Chicken and Dressing Sheet Pan Supper and a sophisticated yet simple Greek-Style Grilled Salmon with Veggies. Then, she gets cozy with a steaming pot of Sausage, Potato & Kale Soup and a fun Cheesy Upside-Down Pizza.

videos.title: Pregame Prep
videos.overview: It's all about pregame prep for a football watching party as Ree Drummond scores big with Drip Beef Meatballs to pile into rolls and BBQ Pulled Chicken for lighter lettuce wraps. Then, she makes fan-favorite Homemade Mini Pizza Bagels and mashes up a dessert dream team for Brookies. It's a winning spread for a big game bash.

videos.title: Over-the-Top Chocolate
videos.overview: Ree Drummond takes chocolate over the top for her friends and family. First, she makes Dulce de Leche Pots de Crème for an elegant girls' night dessert and experiments with White Chocolate Strawberry Martinis to get the party started. Then, it's time for some baking with speedy Saucepan Chocolate Cookies for sweet-toothed Todd and a classic Chocolate Cobbler for his chocoholic father. Ree's cooking, eating and even drinking in her personal chocolate heaven.

videos.title: Merc Homemade
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares homemade takes on star dishes from her Mercantile store in town. There's BBQ Glazed Half Chicken with Balsamic Bacon Brussels Sprouts -- a real menu winner. Then, she makes Chocolate Almond Croissants from the bakery and incredible Parmesan Garlic Fries from the deli. Ree finishes things off with a delicious, easy Roasted Vegetable Quesadilla.

videos.title: Pasta Perfection
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up some all-in-one pasta favorites. She shares her comforting Creamy Chicken Fettuccine Soup, the secret to Roasted Pepper Pasta's easy oven sauce, a special take on a canned classic with One Pot Homemade O's, and a mash-up BLT Pasta. It's all about pasta in four delicious dishes.

videos.title: Tomatoes
videos.overview: Ree Drummond puts tomatoes in the spotlight with her collection of best recipes. First, she makes Stuffed Pizza Crust with a fabulous sauce and salad before preparing the perfect pantry meal of Cheesy Tomato Soup. Then, Ree puts a new spin on a classic with Taco Tomatoes and piles up some delicious Bruschetta.

videos.title: Easy Dinner Party Inspiration
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares her inspirational ideas for impressive dinner parties. There's showstopping Seared Strip Steak with Jalapeño Cream Sauce, one pan Garlic Butter Shrimp Penne that's perfect for a casual get together, a stunning Lighter Braised Greens side dish and make-ahead Tiramisu Cheesecake Cups for a dessert with wow factor. It's dinner time, and the cooking is easy.

videos.title: Breakfast Bakes 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond rises and shines with four delicious breakfast bakes. She starts off with a sweet and easy Maple Pancake Cake before putting a savory spin on a morning classic with her Breakfast Monkey Bread. Then, her Puff Pastry Quiche and Sausage and Pepper Grits Bake are the perfect way to start the day. Breakfast is in the oven, and Ree's baking herself happy!

videos.title: Bowled Over
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up a tasty selection of brilliant bowl food. She gets things started with Chicken Meatball Polenta Bowls before turning it up with terrific Teriyaki Mushroom and Egg Bowls and absolutely stunning Shrimp and Veggie Grain Bowls. Plus, Ree makes cute No-Churn Ice Cream Bowls. Prepare to be bowled over.

videos.title: Brunch Buffet
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares delicious ideas for a perfect brunch buffet. She packs Breakfast Enchiladas with chorizo and scrambled eggs, drizzles Crispy Potato Halves in cilantro garlic sauce, makes an over-the-top mash-up with her Cinnamon Crumb Bagels and preps a Mimosa Bar to put some fizz into morning get togethers. It's a fun, simple line up for a very special spread.

videos.title: 30-Minute Marvels
videos.overview: Ree Drummond moves fast with some fabulous 30-minute one pan meals. First is speedy skillet Fiesta Pork Chops with fixings and a sheet pan Salmon Bake with Caper Herb Mayo on the side. Then, Ree makes One Pot Gnocchi & Cauliflower for pasta pronto and a Snappy Family Style Steak Sandwich. No time is no trouble with these 30-minute marvels.

videos.title: Empty Nesters
videos.overview: Now that all her kids are grown and gone, Ree Drummond can downsize dinner. She makes a small but scrumptious Sausage and Peppers 1/4 Sheet Pan Pizza, just the right amount of Creamy Pesto Pasta, a delicious Wedge Salad for 2 and super cute Mason Jar Lid Chocolate Pies. It's a magnificent meal, perfect for two empty nesters.

videos.title: A Touch of Heat
videos.overview: Ree Drummond spices things up with her favorite speedy Cajun Tequila Shrimp Lettuce Wraps in a riff on a classic. Then, she turns up the heat with an incredibly quick Peppers, Shells & Cheese stuffed with peppers, a colossal Mountain Burger that's inspired by Colorado vacations and a super cool Jalapeno Blackberry Margarita with a kick.

videos.title: 16-Minute Fast Feasts
videos.overview: Ree Drummond spends just 16 minutes cooking four awesome meals. First, she puts a spin on super good Grilled Cheese & Broiled Tomato Soup and whips up Sriracha Maple Salmon for fast fuss-free entertaining. Then, she does chicken dinner on the double with Garlic Parmesan Butterflied Drumsticks & Caprese Salad and makes some marvelous Mushroom Street Tacos.

videos.title: Mom's Night
videos.overview: Ree Drummond welcomes her mom and sister Betsy to a mother-daughter dinner. She starts with fabulous Fried Mushrooms & Onions with Lemon Dill Cream paired with some marvelous Lemon Drop Martinis. For the main course, Ree prepares her mom's Seafood Casserole with a Simple Green Salad and serves up a fabulous dessert finale of Dark Chocolate Lava Cakes topped with Raspberry Whipped Cream.

videos.title: Recipe Revamps
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares some on-trend recipes from recent years. First, she tackles a social media phenomenon with super popular Birria Tacos and puts a new take on everyone's favorite with pull apart Pizza Rolls. Then, it's all about beets in Ree's Hidden Secret Brownies, and Fried Pasta adds some crunch to a classic.

videos.title: Cowboy Birthday Dinner
videos.overview: It's Ladd's birthday, so Ree Drummond makes his dream dinner. She creates a Guajillo Chili Pot Roast with a side of Creamy Rustic Mashed Potatoes that's topped with Chili Herb Cowboy Butter. Instead of a cake for dessert, Ree bakes decadent chocolate Chuckwagon Brownies. While Ladd spends the afternoon feeding cattle in the snow, Ree cooks the perfect cowboy birthday dinner.

videos.title: Worth the Hype
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up some super fun social media marvels! She tries her hand at a sensational 3 Sauce Baked Spaghetti that's all the rage. Then, she takes on the trends with simple shortcut Lazy Red and Green Enchiladas, the easiest Garlic Butter Bath Biscuits and crazy good Spicy Bacon Pickle Bites. They're all officially worth the hype.

videos.title: Ranching & Ready to Go
videos.overview: While Ladd, Alex and the cowboys work cattle in Kansas, Ree Drummond fills the freezer with six lovely layered Chicken Spinach Artichoke Lasagnas and a batch of copycat Convenience Store Burritos for speedy breakfasts. Then, she gets ahead with a Skirt Steak Dinner Kit ready for when her cowboy and cowgirl get home.

videos.title: Dad Delivery
videos.overview: Ree Drummond has a housewarming dinner to take to her dad and stepmom in their new home. She starts with chewy, delicious Homemade Egg Noodles to go in Comforting Rustic Chicken and Noodles, served with Cheddar and Rosemary Drop Biscuits on the side. Then as a sweet treat, she makes decadent Brownie Truffles.

videos.title: Hard Hat Party at the Ranch
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is building a new house, and her favorite women are coming over for casual eats, cocktails and a look-around. She makes Mini Pineapple Shrimp Tostadas to build on site and four-ingredient Bacon-Wrapped Baby Potatoes for a perfect mouthful. Next, she whips up a simple, no-cook Charcuterie Board, gorgeous layered individual Boozy Chocolate Trifles and Blackberry Blood Orange Mojitos to toast the new place.

videos.title: Rotisserie Chicken Dinners 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond turns store-bought rotisserie chicken into four quick and easy dinners. She makes a perfect one-pan pasta with her shortcut Chicken, Sausage & Gnocchi and tosses together a Hickory BBQ Chicken Salad that looks as good as it tastes. Then, she stuffs super-fast Chicken Artichoke Bread Bombs and saves time with game-changing Fried Chicken Verde Tacos.

videos.title: Oklahoma Classics
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares favorite foods from her home state of Oklahoma. She serves up saucy Chili Cheese Tots, a drive-in classic, and smashes a sensational Onion Burger that everyone loves. Next, she fries crispy Fried Okra, the star of the state meal, and toasts the evening with a Boozy Blended Root Beer Float that's totally over the top.

videos.title: Sweet Summer
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares cool desserts for hot summer days. She starts with a delicious Cherry Almond Chocolate Chunk Ice Cream that she loves, followed by Boozy Blackberry Lime Whips that are perfect for parties. Then, Ree takes on a freezer aisle classic, Homemade Dipped Cones, and fabulous frozen Prosecco Grapes that are a little bit fancy.

videos.title: Treats for Todd
videos.overview: Ree Drummond has a care package for her youngest college kid, Todd. She's sending him sweet Mini Strawberry Tarts and Chocolate Hazelnut Oatmeal Bars to share with his roommates. Then, Ree packs up cheesy Chipotle Cheddar Snack Mix, always a favorite, and Spirit Pretzels in red and white, his team colors.

videos.title: Lickety-Split
videos.overview: This potluck season, Ree Drummond is all about super-fast BBQ eats! She prepares a make-ahead Berry Cheesecake Icebox Pie that's a total showstopper and puts a spin on a classic with shortcut Hash Brown Potato Salad. Then, Ree whips up a colorful Cowboy Caviar that doubles as a dip and salad, and she gets sticky with spicy BBQ Peach Smoked Sausage.

videos.title: Ask Me Anything: Quick and Easy
videos.overview: Ree Drummond hosts a quick and easy Q&A with questions from friends, townsfolk and visitors to Pawhuska. The answers start with a party perfect Epic Dip Platter that involves almost zero cooking. Then, Ree makes Speedy Hamburger Soup while revealing her standby secrets. Next, she shares her build-your-own Easy Tomato Cream Pasta and faces a culinary challenge with a 3-Ingredient Sausage Casserole.

videos.title: The Perfect Freeze
videos.overview: Ree Drummond stocks the freezer with some all-time favorites. First, her Pineapple Pork Shoulder is easy, economical and amazing in so many meals. Then, she makes a rich and hearty Slow Simmered Beef Ragu -- a simple yet special pasta sauce for anything from weeknights to dinner parties. For breakfast, there's Sweet & Savory Breakfast Wraps for a quick heat-and-go start to the day. Finally, shortcut Brownie Ice Cream Bites are the perfect frozen sweet treat.

videos.title: Game Day MVPs
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares a line-up of fabulous football food, starting with her Smoked Brisket Queso piled high with loads of awesome toppings. Then, she preps a crowd-pleasing Chicken Caesar Party Sub, a mega sandwich take on a salad that everyone loves, three-ingredient Crispy Cookie Bark for a game-changing treat and a Spiked Strawberry Jalapeno Lemonade that's a touchdown in cocktail form.

videos.title: Remembering Chuck
videos.overview: Ree Drummond celebrates the life of her wonderful late father-in-law, Chuck Drummond, with some of his favorite recipes. He was a lifelong chocoholic, so she bakes the decadent Skillet Chocolate Cakes he loved. Then, she makes Biscuits and Sausage Pepper Gravy just the way he always liked them, Tenderloin Steak Bites in tribute to the legendary cattleman and Shrimp Brochette Jalapeno Poppers, a mashup of his two favorite appetizers.

videos.title: Short and Sweet
videos.overview: Ree Drummond makes super-fast sweets with easy shortcuts while Ladd and his crew are hauling hay in the sunshine. There's a showstopping Layered Tiramisu Cake that's perfect for easy entertaining and a simply stunning Sticky Bun Crinkle Cake that's a spin on a classic Tarte Tatin. Next is a charming Cherry Chocolate Mug Cake for a solo treat followed by fabulous, fruity, frozen Blackberry Lemon Ice Cream.

videos.title: Fresh from the Merc
videos.overview: Ree Drummond and her sister, Betsy, are making over her Mercantile store and fixing up the menu with some new favorite dishes. There's Crunchy French Toast, the breakfast time star, and an incredibly easy, no-cook Heirloom Tomato Salad that's a must have. Then, the Smokie Okie is a fabulous fried chicken BLT sandwich, and Ree's showstopping Strawberry Cake is the top dessert in the deli.

videos.title: Fall in Love
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is all about fabulous, fall-inspired food that's perfect for getting cozy. There's easy Pecan Crusted Pork Chops with Whiskey Cream Sauce that's a divine love match and irresistible Glazed Apple Cider Donuts that star fresh autumn fruit. Then, Ree's Root Vegetables with Spicy Italian Sausage and her Butternut Squash Fettuccini Alfredo are officially the ultimate fall comfort meals.

videos.title: Thanksgiving Sweets to Bring
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is in the holiday spirit, sharing showstopping sweets perfect for a Thanksgiving feast. There's a seasonal Pumpkin Cream Cake that's just the thing for the big day and an impressive Cranberry Orange Trifle that's simple and stunning. Then, Ree puts a spin on the classics with an out-of-this-world Sheet Pan Dutch Apple Tart and downright delicious Pretzel White Chocolate Cookies.

videos.title: Thanksgiving Sides Central
videos.overview: Ree Drummond puts a spin on everyone's favorite Thanksgiving sides as she makes over super colorful Spicy Maple Roasted Carrots and takes mac and cheese to the next level with her Baked Cheesy O's. Then, Ree bakes a shortcut Cheesy Brown Butter Focaccia, the big day bread of her dreams, and updates Broccoli Casserole in a fabulously fresh take on a classic.

videos.title: Quick and Easy Party Faves
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is all about fast and fabulous party food for easy entertaining. First, she makes totally delicious Herby Mediterranean Meatballs that do triple duty as a main, starter or an app. Then, she serves up an incredible Cajun Shrimp Cocktail and mashes up Jalapeno Cheeseburger Wontons. Finally, she bakes sweet, sophisticated and fun Rum Balls, perfect any time you need a treat.

videos.title: Christmas in Pawhuska
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares four fabulous festive specials from the menus at her food spots in town. There's Braised Beef Short Rib Pot Roast, her gift to you from the Merc, and charming snowflake Molasses Cookies from the bakery. Then, she indulges in a super fun Cookies for Santa Sundae from Charlie's, Ree's ice cream parlor, and a Pumpkin Pie-tini from the P-Town pizzeria bar, perfect to toast the holidays.

videos.title: Childhood Comfort Classics
videos.overview: Ree Drummond takes a trip down memory lane with updated comfort food favorites from her childhood. She starts with soothing Retro Noodle Soup and an amazing Air Fryer Grilled Cheese. Next, Ree makes Spaghetti and Cheese, a lifelong favorite, and nostalgic Pizza Stuffed Peppers, inspired by her mom's recipe. Finally, Ree starts a comeback tour for the classic Chocolate Malt.

videos.title: Easy Recipes for Busy Times
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares super simple recipes for the snowiest days. First, she warms up a winning Tex-Mex Spicy Chicken and Black Bean Soup and a one-pan supper of Mango Glazed Cod, perfect for effortless entertaining. Then, Ree prepares her favorite Creamy Arrabbiata Pasta and a shortcut Cast Iron Breakfast Pizza that will help everyone rise and shine.

videos.title: Fresh and Simple
videos.overview: Ree Drummond puts a light spin on delicious, easy recipes. First, there's a Surf and Turf Skillet that's a riot of color and flavor. Then, she makes a Spiced Chicken Sheet Pan Supper served in lettuce cups and topped with salad. Next, vegetables are the star in Ree's Mushroom and Squash Fajita Bowls with Cilantro Lime Cauliflower Rice and Tex-Mex toppings. Finally, Whipped Cottage Cheese with Roasted Berries is a light and lovely dessert.

videos.title: Hosting on a Dime
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up budget friendly food for entertaining. There's surprisingly frugal French Beef Bourguignon, slow cooked and served over buttery lemon parsley noodles, and economical little Salmon Cakes that elevate canned fish to the next level. Then, she makes irresistible and inexpensive Fried Olives, and thrifty, yet very impressive, Toasted Coconut Puddings.

videos.title: Make-Ahead Brunch
videos.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up make-ahead savory, sweet and sippable marvels for brilliant brunch parties. There's a fabulous flavorful French Onion Frittata to wow your guests and a one-pan Lemon Blueberry French Toast Casserole that's super easy. Next up are Sweet Glazed Cherry Almond Rolls that everyone loves, followed by a pitcher of spicy Tex-Mex Bloody Mary, a spin on a classic cocktail.

videos.title: Simply Chocolate 4 Ways
videos.overview: Calling all chocolate lovers! Ree Drummond makes incredible, no-fuss Triple Chocolate Mini Muffins for the ultimate all day snack and shortcut Chocolatey Biscuit Donuts, perfect for dessert or a treat. Then, she has stylish and showstopping homemade Peanut Butter Cups, and a Mocha Dalgona, the whipped coffee that's a social media sensation.

videos.title: Ready for Game Day
videos.overview: Ree Drummond's son, Bryce, is preparing for a big game clash on TV, so Ree is previewing the food she'll make for the watch party. She has retro favorite Oatmeal Pies that everyone gets a kick out of, quick Cheesy Ground Beef Tacos and Cheesesteak Sliders, a dream team mash-up of classic cheesesteak in snack-sized rolls. Finally, she preps game-changing Jalapeno Ranch Potato Skins for the win.

videos.title: Comfort Made Easy
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares simple and stunning takes on comfort classics. First, she spices up Tex-Mex Chicken Fried Steak with delicious peppers and gravy before putting a one-pan speedy spin on stunning Pesto Chicken Lasagna Skillet with great time saving shortcuts. Then, Ree's quick Cream of Celery Soup has a comforting retro vibe, while her feel-good White Chocolate Hot Chocolate is luxurious and decadent.

videos.title: Perfect for Two
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shares perfectly portioned quick and easy meals for two. She has a one-pan meat and potatoes wonder, Apple Cider Pork Chops, with a sweet, sticky sauce and speedy Easy Corn Pasta that's a 16-minute marvel. Then, she serves fast comfort food with her Meatloaf Patties and a shortcut side of Instant Cheesy Mash that's good enough for company.

videos.title: Spring Sensations
videos.overview: Spring is in the air, and Ree Drummond celebrates the season with a light and lovely Angel Food Cake with Rosé Berries. Then, she has two seasonal one pan wonders: an impressively easy Mushroom and Asparagus Oven Risotto and an epic, crisp and gooey Spring Grilled Cheese. Finally, Ree makes Mini Cauliflower Pizzas for a fresh spin on a favorite.

videos.title: Quick Cooking for Cowboys
videos.overview: Ree Drummond serves up breakfast, lunch and dinner for the cowboys and cowgirl in her life. First, she whips up a stack of Perfect Pancakes for Ladd, who's calling in on the way to haul cattle with Paige and the cowboys. They drop by to collect lunch to-go with over-the-top Rustic Meatball Subs and a tangle of Fried Red Onions. Finally, Ree prepares a Cashew Pork that's perfect for a rancher's supper.

videos.title: Spring Supper
videos.overview: Ree Drummond makes a spectacular and simple spring dinner. She serves up a magnificent seasonal spread starring grilled and gorgeous Garlic Herb Lamb Chops with cheesy and totally Over-the-Top Scalloped Potatoes and colorful Herby Roasted Carrots and Radishes on the side. For dessert, Ree has fabulously easy Pineapple Bars.

videos.title: Paige Is Home
videos.overview: Ree Drummond's daughter, Paige, has returned to work for the family business with Ladd, so Ree stocks her fridge with Sausage, Potato and Corn Chowder in a spin on Paige's favorite soup. Then, she fills the freezer with perfect grab-and-go Croissant Breakfast Sandwiches, ideal for early starts, some easy Homemade Pizza Snacks, inspired by the supermarket food she loved as a kid, and delicious Chocolate Toffee Crunch Cookies stuffed with sweets she adores.

videos.title: Berrylicious 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond gets cooking with a bounty of berries! She incorporates them into delicious iced Raspberry Scones, sweet and savory Sticky Blueberry Wings and a luxurious Blackberry Brie Grilled Cheese that takes a classic to the next level. Finally, she packs berry goodness into her very Grown-Up Strawberry Slush.

videos.title: Spicy Sister Supper
videos.overview: Ree Drummond turns up the heat for dinner with her sister, Betsy. She makes a stunning Spicy Blackberry Pork Loin with a sticky and savory glaze, a magnificent fiery Baked Pepper Mac and Cheese on the side, and a Mango Chipotle Kale Salad with a smoky, sweet and spicy edge. After all that fire, she shakes up icy Salted Melon Margaritas, the perfect cooling cocktail.

videos.title: Paige on the Ranch
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is making a well-earned lunch for Ladd and his new cowgirl, Paige, who are out shipping cattle. There's amazing Pasta with Pancetta and Corn, perfect for her pasta-loving daughter who has just joined the family business. On the side, there's delicious Lemon Pepper Chopped Salad and fantastic Individual Skillet Focaccia. For dessert, Ree has rancher-approved Easy Chocolate Orange Ice Cream.

videos.title: Positively Potluck 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond takes potluck classics to the next level. She makes Chorizo Baked Beans that are a sure-fire crowd pleaser and elevates an awesome Napa Cabbage Salad into a buffet must-have. Then, Ree puts a whole new spin on a favorite with Smashed Potato Salad and updates Lemon Blueberry Ice Box Cake to take to a girls' get-together, where it's guaranteed to be the star of the spread.

videos.title: Glorious Grilling
videos.overview: Ree Drummond grills a whole meal over the flames with a little help from some indoor prep. There's surf and turf with spectacular Herby Grilled Shrimp and Scallop Skewers and juicy marinated Savory Grilled Steak Skewers. On the side, there's an amazing Charred Broccoli and Cauliflower Salad, plus great Grilled Yukon Gold Potatoes with a spicy butter. Finally, Ree combines hot and cold with Coconut Cream Icebox Pie with Grilled Pineapple.

videos.title: All About Ladd
videos.overview: Ree Drummond shines a spotlight on her husband, Ladd, when she makes Ultimate Breakfast Bakes for him to take to their son Bryce at college. Then, she shares Ladd's Prime Rib with delicious jus -- his all-time favorite -- with enough leftovers for epic Prime Rib Sandwiches or a quick and easy Prime Rib Salad. Finally, Ree treats her chocoholic rancher to an awesome Double Chocolate Shake.

videos.title: Element of Surprise
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is using unexpected ingredients in delicious ways. First, she adds ale to an incredible loaded Beer Cheese Soup, and pork stars in a delicious Pork Belly Crouton Salad that's out of this world. Then, maple syrup elevates Ree's quick and easy Maple Brown Butter Ravioli, and frozen jalapeno dust and potato chips take Cowboy Chocolate Bark to the next level.

videos.title: The Great Kitchen Clean-Out
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cleaning out her kitchen by turning leftovers into amazing dishes. She starts in the pantry with Brown Sugar Buttermilk Waffles with a sensational brown sugar syrup and uses her frozen odds and ends to build a perfect Cheesy Freezer Chicken Pot Pie. Then, the fridge scraps are in the spotlight in a Loaded Egg Salad Sandwich, and a final run through the pantry turns into a Bean and Bacon Soup, a well-earned lunch for Ladd, who's spending the morning moving cattle.

videos.title: Simply Comfort 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking in the comfort zone as she shares easy, feel-good recipes. First, she serves up Broccoli Chicken and Cheese Soup in a crusty bread bowl before using a shortcut to bake an outrageously cheesy Creamy Sage Baked Ravioli. Then, Ree makes a marvelous meatless Cauliflower Parm and puts comfort in a cup with her luxurious Hazelnut Hot Chocolate cooked in the slow cooker.

videos.title: Thanksgiving Legends
videos.overview: Ree Drummond celebrates Thanksgiving by putting her own spin on classic dishes. First, she makes Legendary Green Bean Casserole from scratch and bakes retro Sweet Potato Rolls, the perfect accompaniment for the big feast. Then, an incredible Molded Cranberry Salad is as good now as when Ree was a kid, and a fabulous Old-Fashioned Custard Pie puts the spotlight on dessert.

videos.title: 4 Bites and a Cocktail
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing an epic spread for the perfect all-purpose Thanksgiving cocktail party. First, she makes fabulous, festive Whipped Feta and Balsamic Grapes, and marvelous, cheesy Mini Sausage Rolls are a holiday must have. Next, stunning Bacon Wrapped Scallops are followed by a stress-free family favorite, Sweet Pepper Poppers. Finally, Ree whips up cheery Cranberry Vodka Sangria to toast the holidays.

videos.title: Fast and Festive 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing fabulous ideas for holiday cooking in a hurry, starting with a mashup of two favorites in an amazing Benedict Breakfast Hash. Then, Ree makes a super quick Christmas Burger, and Skillet Pizza Dip is a stress-free seasonal appetizer. Finally, easy shortcuts make Festive Tortellini Soup perfect for the holidays.

videos.title: Homemade Holiday
videos.overview: For Christmas, Ree Drummond is giving edible gifts and kitchen cookware to four dear friends. First, she fills a casserole dish with Chai Spiced Orange Rolls in a new take on a festive classic. Then, Red Wine Onion Jam stars in a beautiful, seasonal charcuterie board, and a kit for Coconut Cherry Almond Cookies has everything needed to bake the holiday treats. Finally, Ree makes Slow Cooker Chicken and Rice Soup for a super comforting homemade gift.

videos.title: Ask Me Anything: Holiday Favorites
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is taking questions about holiday favorites, and the answers start with a Christmas family-tradition breakfast of Fried Quail with Biscuits and Gravy. Then, Ree's got crowd-pleasing queries covered with incredible Short Rib Spaghetti Sauce, and she makes an impressive big-day dish of Herby Sticky Spiral Glazed Ham while sharing some side dish secrets. Finally, Ree's Sticky Toffee Braid is a festive, super-quick dessert.

videos.title: Portable Dinner Party
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking for a delicious dinner party that she's co-hosting at her best friend's house. To start, she makes Roasted Jalapeno Pimento Cheese, a scrumptious make-ahead dip. The main course is a crowd-pleasing Baked Sausage and Peppers Bucatini and an easily transportable, stunning Hearty Citrus Salad. For dessert, Ree whips up an amazing Espresso Cream Poke Cake, a fabulous finale with decadent frosting.

videos.title: New House Brunch
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is hosting a Tex-Mex brunch in her new home and sharing the story of the construction. She's serving a make-ahead spread with spicy Breakfast Enchiladas and a Churro French Toast Bake with Chocolate Butter. Plus, there's a marvelous Mango Salad, and simple fizzy drinks feel more special with berries added.

videos.title: Eat Your Protein
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing four protein-packed and super easy dishes. First, Ree makes Fish Taco Salad with delicious, spiced cod, a chile lime yogurt dressing and amazing mango pico de gallo. Then, Beef and Bean Stuffed Peppers are perfect for a hearty mid-week dinner, and Egg White Bites are great for breakfast. Finally, Ree's Nut Granola Parfait is the perfect anytime treat.

videos.title: Dinner on a Dime
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking a collection of budget friendly dinners, starting with a fancy yet frugal Chicken Stroganoff with buttery parsley noodles that's perfect for dinner parties. Then, impressive Sausage and Mushroom Stuffed Acorn Squash is an economical all-in-one winner, and inexpensive shortcut Puff Pastry Pizzas are just the thing for an easy weeknight dinner. Finally, thrifty mashup Meatball Sub Quesadillas are a quick, anytime meal.

videos.title: Chocolate Memories
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is taking a trip down memory lane by sharing chocolate recipes that are special to her. First, Ree loved her family's Chocolate Cake with 7-Minute Frosting as a kid, and she loves it still. Then, Ree makes a Chocolate Rice Pudding that reminds her of her beloved grandma, and three favorite childhood cereals get rolled into Ree's Chocolate Cereal Treats, a chocolate lover's dream. Finally, Ree bakes The Best Mini Chocolate Chip Cookies, just like the ones she ate on family vacations in the old days.

videos.title: For the Win
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is preparing a selection of easy game-day eats. First, there's a simple but game-changing Chocolate Devil Cake. Then, Ree scores big with Smash Tacos, a dream-team beefy mashup of burgers and tortillas, and she brings her snacking A game with incredible, speedy Sticky Chicken Legs. Finally, there's no contest when it comes to Jalapeno Cheddar Corn Dogs being a real game-day favorite.

videos.title: Two's Company
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is making fast and fabulous food for two. First, a speedy Sausage and Gnocchi Skillet is great for sharing. Then, a Tex-Mex style loaded Shrimp and Bacon Quesadilla is another delicious main course, and Ree combines two Drummond favorites in Steakhouse Ciabatta Pizzas. Finally, breakfast is in the spotlight with a couple of Pancake Bowls, the perfect way to start the day.

videos.title: Ree's New Garden
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking with produce from her new kitchen garden. First, a prize zucchini makes Chocolate Zucchini Muffins moist and marvelous. Beautiful basil stars in her easy Best Ever Pesto, which takes a simple Tomato Sandwich to the next level. Fresh-picked jalapeno and cherry tomatoes are delicious in a Green Goddess Chopped Salad, and finally, a stellar cast of herbs and peppers are in the spotlight in Ree's incredible Spicy Herb Garden Butter.

videos.title: Handheld Heroes
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing easy handheld eats for busy people on the go. To start the day, amazing shortcut Italian-inspired Breakfast Croissants are delivered to the cowboys by Paige. Then, Ree makes three lunches, starting with portable all-in-one roast Pork and Pepper Pitas. Next, an entire favorite salad is packed into a stunning Chef Salad Wrap, and a tasty Nori Wrap is perfect for a lunchbox, picnic or car trip.

videos.title: Countertop Cooking
videos.overview: It's all about appliances as Ree Drummond is cooking on the countertop. First, Ree puts together a speedy all-in-one Sausage and Potato Soup in the pressure cooker. Then, the air fryer is perfect for fabulous, fast BBQ Chicken Bagel Pizza, and the microwave serves up a quick Brownie Bowl with decadent chocolate glaze and ice cream. Finally, the toaster is in the spotlight for a beautiful Breakfast Quesadilla.

videos.title: Apps Made Easy
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is making a selection of easy and impressive appetizers. First, stunning no-fuss Tex-Mex Sausage Balls are paired with an amazing dipping sauce. Then, Ree prepares Crostini Two Ways -- with delicious Gorgonzola and Prosciutto and perfect Roasted Pepper and Parm. Next, shortcut Mini Lemon Raspberry Bundt Cakes with a beautiful pink frosting are elegant and effortless. Finally, Ree cooks up juicy Ribeye Bites with Horseradish Mustard Aioli that packs a punch.

videos.title: Ranch Dinners
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking authentic ranch-style dinners while Ladd and Paige are working with the bulls. She's starting with one of their favorites, Crispy Shrimp Tacos, followed by a stunning, hearty 7-Layer Casserole that cowboys and cowgirls love. A simple BBQ Chicken Sheet Pan Supper is an all-in-one winner, and for the working crew's dinner, you can't get more ranch than Easy Oven Burnt Ends.

videos.title: Beautiful Brunch
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is ready to rise and shine with a selection of easy, impressive ideas for brunch. First, Ree's making next-level Brioche French Toast with luxurious Citrus Cream Cheese. Then, a fabulous Egg White Frittata is a perfect all-in-one start to the day, and cinnamon sugar-coated Mini French Breakfast Puffs are irresistible. Finally, sweet and spicy Million Dollar Bacon totally lives up to its name.

videos.title: Family News
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing family news while cooking for her kids. She's making Orange Chicken and Peppers for Paige, in a spin on one of her favorites. Next, she prepares a brilliant French Onion Casserole for Alex to have on standby after her baby is born. Then, Ree's hitting the road to take food to her college boys with Totally Terrific Cookies for Todd and a big pan of Sloppy Joes To Go for Bryce and his roommates.

videos.title: Cookout Potluck
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is updating potluck cookout classics with three showstopping sides and a super special sweet. First, Blueberry Crisp Dump Cake combines two absolute favorites in one beautiful dessert. Then, it's all about sides with crowd-pleasing Hot Honey Corn, a big batch of Maple Bourbon Baked Beans, and Perfect Crunchy Coleslaw that everyone will love.

videos.title: Fiesta Feast
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is making a delicious fiesta spread for a fun get-together. Spicy Tex-Mex Chicken is perfect piled into a taco with all the fixings, and stunning Charro Style Beans are a real crowd pleaser. Then, there's totally over-the-top Loaded Guacamole, and fabulous frozen Blueberry Peach Margaritas are a fruity spin on a favorite cocktail.

videos.title: Slow and Easy
videos.overview: It's all about minimum effort and maximum flavor as Ree Drummond celebrates slow-cooked food that's super quick to make. First, there's incredible Slow Roasted Chicken and Vegetables for a stunning one-pan dinner. Then, fall-apart tender Best Ever Oven Brisket is perfect with comforting mashed potatoes. Cherry Tomato Confit is very versatile and delicious as a Tomato Toast snack, and finally, a gooey Slow Cooker Chocolate Pudding Cake is decadent and delicious.

videos.title: Take Comfort
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is taking comfort food on the road, starting with marvelous Meatloaf Sliders that are perfect for potlucks and tailgating. Next, she's making cowboy-approved Chicken Pot Hand Pies for an all-in-one working lunch and elevating food on the go with Pimento Cheese BLTs in another comfort classic combination. Finally, Ree's putting a spin on a childhood favorite with Homemade Crustless PB&Js that are deliciously portable for kids of all ages.

videos.title: No Cook Sweets 4 Ways
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing a selection of sensational sweets with no cooking required. First, a showstopping Whiskey Peach Icebox Pie is perfect for parties. Then, a shortcut Lemon Pudding Bowl is elegant and easy. There are incredible Iced Coffee Pops for an anytime snack, and bite-sized Chocolate Peanut Butter Dates serve double duty as an app or a sweet, salty treat.

videos.title: More Cheese Please
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is getting very cheesy! Creamy mascarpone is in the spotlight in Ree's sweet Mascarpone Cheesecake Bars with a cheery cherry topping. A divine duo of Oaxaca cheese and sharp cheddar elevate classic Cheese Enchiladas. Pepper Jack and Colby Jack team up in Beer Cheese for 2, and Brie stars as a perfect app or starter with a crispy caramel topping in amazing Brie Brûlée.

videos.title: Daily Bread
videos.overview: Bread is in the spotlight with Ree Drummond's beautiful Pimento Cheese Biscuits, divine as a snack or a side, spread with Sweet Spicy Butter. Then, Ree's making gorgeous Garlic Flatbreads from scratch and turning breadcrumbs into a heavenly coating for crisp Breaded Mozzarella that's a perfect snack or appetizer. Finally, Yeasted White Bread is a superstar, but also easy, homemade loaf.

videos.title: 16-Minute Meals: New Generation
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is putting a fresh spin on four awesome 16-minute meals. There's a surprising Queso Steak Salad that's outrageously good, followed by fun and easy BBQ Meatball Subs. Next, Shrimp Scampi Pizzas are a mashup of two absolute favorites, and finally, Ree's quick Creamy Garlic Chicken is made in moments.

videos.title: Always Pasta 4 Ways
videos.overview: It's pasta all the way as Ree Drummond shares the pasta love with four recipes. First, Ree makes incredibly quick and easy skillet Chuckwagon Pasta. Then, Ree keeps things cool with a Pickle-tastic Pasta Salad that's a total treat for the tastebuds, and shortcuts make a Green Chili Chicken Ravioli Bake as simple as it is delicious. Finally, there's a new spin on a favorite when Ree whips up Drunken Pasta 2.0.

videos.title: Last Minute Company
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing a foolproof plan for an impromptu Tex-Mex dinner party. For the main course, there are quick and easy Chili Orange Steak Street Tacos with simple Cilantro Salsa, and a stunning Corn and Black Bean Salad is served with an amazing Creamy Jalapeño Lime Dressing. For dessert, Ree makes a showstopping shortcut Strawberry Tres Leches Cake. Plus, a classic Margarita Pitcher is on the cocktail menu for a spur of the moment get-together.

videos.title: Dreaming of Italy
videos.overview: Ree Drummond is taking a kitchen trip to Italy by making Italian-inspired favorites. First, sensational Creamy Shrimp Pasta is perfect for any pasta lover. Then, Ree makes her version of Crispy Fried Eggplant, and a Pea and Burrata Salad is a triumph of simplicity and deliciousness. Finally, for a taste of the dolce vita, Olive Oil Caramel Sundae is a social media sensation for all the right reasons.
